item.title: Spelling - BrE & AmE
item.description: British/American -our/-or Non-stressed syllables, AmE tends to spell -or instead of -our. BrE AmE armour armor behaviour behavior colour color endeavour endeavor favour favor flavour flavor glamour glamor, glamour harbour harbor honour honor humour humor labour labor neighbour neighbor rigour rigor rumour rumor saviour savior, saviour vigour vigor -re/-er -l/-ll Non-stressed syllables Base BrE AmE jewel jeweller jeweler travel traveller, travelled, travelling traveller, traveled, traveling wool woollen woolen Stressed syllables BrE AmE appal appall enrol enroll distil distill fulfil fulfill skilful skillful Special cases BrE AmE install install expel expel repel repel until until ae, oe/e Others
